steps.content: Grab Coast waypoint, go to Mud Flats
In Mudflats get 3 eggs and go to Submerged Passage, grab waypoint
Go to Coast Waypoint, head to Tidal Island and kill Hailrake

Back to Submerged Passage, go to the Ledge 
Grab Waypoint, go to the Climb
Go to Lower Prison, grab Waypoint
Back to Submerged Passage, go to Submerged Passage kill Dweller of the Deeps

Back to Lower Prison: 
Finish Labyrinth
Go to Warden's Quarter then Warden's Chamber and kill Brutus
Grab Prisoner's Gate waypoint, back to town to grab gems if necessary
Back to Prisoner's Gate, go to Ship Graveyard, grab waypoint
Go to Ship Graveyard Cave, grab Allflame
Go to Cavern of Wrath, get waypoint, take waypoint to Ship Graveyard, kill Fairgraves
Back to town, get Skillpoint from Bestel and maybe gems from Nessa
Take waypoint to Cavern of Wrath, go to Cavern of Anger, exit to Merveil's Lair and kill Merveil.
Exit to Act 2 and run through zone to enter the Forest Encampment.
